about_the_game:
Story Plot: Do you believe in time travel? If you don't, let me tell you my story. Well, I'm just a normal 19-year-old guy. The only special thing about me is I can travel... 30 seconds into the future. I don't know why. It just started to happen when I masturbated the very first time. When I stare at anything without blinking (at that time, I focused on the girl's boobs when I was watching porn), I can see what will happen in the next 30 seconds. And my story starts on the day that Ha-Young, a girl in my university, asks me if she should participate in a beauty contest. I motivate her, trying to be cool. But after I look into her eyes for a few seconds, I see myself in a far future. And, wow! Ha-Young will become my wife! But... The future is so fragile. It can be changed by just a small mistake...

At the start of Episode 01, you can choose to play as the MC or as Ha-Young.

If you play as the MC, depending on your choices, the game will lead you to one of these routes:

  • Romance & Harem: You will live with only one girl (Romance) or more (Harem) at the end of the story.

  • Sharing: You share the girls with other men.

  • NTR: You are cuckolded.

If you play as Ha-Young, depending on her choices, the game will lead her to one of these routes:

  • Faithful: Ha-Young stays faithful to you.

  • Swinging: Ha-Young agrees to swap couples.

  • Corruption: Ha-Young is corrupted and cheats on you.

My Future Wife is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings:

  • If you hate NTR (Netorare), you only need to stop the other guys from touching your women.

  • If you're okay with sharing, you can let the other guys have fun with your women.

  • But if you let everything get out of your control, you'll lose everything!

Notice:

  • If you can't have the endings you want, please use the walkthroughs: one with preview images (you will be able to know how to reach the scenes you want faster) or one without preview images (it won't spoil the story). The walkthroughs are in the game folder. The default location on Windows is: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\My Future Wife (InsanErotica).

Since My Future Wife is still being developed, the price of it in the Early Access is lower than the expected price when the full version is out:

  • v1.0 (initial release): 90% of the expected price.

  • v1.1 (add more scenes): 95% of the expected price.

  • v1.2 (add the Epilogue): 100% of the expected price.

The game will be automatically updated for everyone who has already been owning it. Therefore, the sooner you buy My Future Wife, the cheaper it is for you!

Thank you for playing My Future Wife.

I'm very appreciative of your feedback after playing so I can make it better in my future projects.

Regards!
